title: Overall
stimulusHtml:
8-9:

contains a clear, well-developed thesis that deals with the extent to which each of the two topics influenced the development of democracy.

supports the thesis with substantial, relevant information.

understands the complexity of the question; deals with two of the four topics in depth, although treatment may not be balanced.

effective analysis.

may contain minor errors.

5-7:

contains a clear thesis with limited development concerning the extent to which each of the two topics influenced the development of democracy.

supports the thesis with some factual information.

limited understanding of the complexity; must deal with two topics, one some depth and one in a limited way, or two in a general way.

limited analysis, mostly describes.

may contain errors that do not detract form the overall argument.

2-4:

lacks thesis, or thesis may be confused or underdeveloped.

information provided is minimal, or lacks supporting information.

ignores complexity; may deal with two topics in a superficial way, only one in a general way.

has no analysis.

may contain major errors.

0-1:

is an incompetent response.

may paraphrase or restate the question.

exhibits little or no understanding of the question.
